reference.shortdesc: The bookabstract element references a topic that includes a brief summary of the book content.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: A book abstract is generally rendered as part of the book's front matter. It is used to help the reader quickly evaluate the book's purpose.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bookabstract element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
